Class CPU

  • java.lang.Object
    • CPU

  • public class CPU
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encloses the virtual CPU, which has a memory and a operand stack

    • Constructor Summary

      CPU()
      CPU class constructor.
      CPU(ByteCodeProgram bcnew)
      CPU class 1 argument constructor.
